newsList.content: Недавно пересмотрел Mad Max Fury Road

I think Skyblock at its core is an ultimate challenge of resource management. You spawn on a tiny island, all you have is a tree, some supplies and some dirt to stand on. You have to treasure every dirt block, because if one fall into the void, there is no way to replace it. And as you carefully navigate your absurd circumstances, you gain a new appreciation for the few things you have as you meticulously use them to their fullest effect. With nothing but some ice, lava and saplings you slowly transform this empty expanse into the world of your very own. Skyblock teaches us that no matter how ridiculous the odds may seem, within us relies the power to overcome these challenges and achieve something beautiful. So that, one day, we'll look back to where we've started, and be amazed by how far we've come.
